early.description: Born with a rare genetic trait, you were identified by the corporation for a special program.
At a young age, you displayed exceptional cognitive abilities, attracting corporate attention.
You were enrolled in an advanced learning facility, where your days were filled with tests and evaluations.
A series of cognitive enhancement procedures improved your intellect but left you feeling disconnected.
You formed a bond with a fellow participant, providing mutual support in an isolating environment.
An experiment resulted in unexpected side effects, heightening your senses but causing discomfort.
You discovered inconsistencies in the information provided to you, sparking curiosity and suspicion.
A kind technician shared stories of the outside world, igniting a desire for freedom.
You excelled in problem-solving tasks, often exceeding the expectations of your overseers.
An accident during a test exposed you to confidential information, altering your perspective.
You began keeping a secret journal of your experiences, honing your analytical skills.
A sudden change in routine made you question the true purpose of the experiments.
You developed a method to solve complex puzzles more efficiently, impressing your supervisors.
An equipment malfunction during a test required you to act quickly, showcasing your adaptability.
You overheard conversations hinting at future plans for you, causing anxiety and uncertainty.
A fellow participant's sudden absence raised concerns about the safety of the program.
You began to experience vivid dreams that seemed more like memories, blurring reality.

mid.description: You discovered a hidden passage within the facility, opening up possibilities for exploration.
An experimental procedure enhanced your cognitive functions but left you emotionally numb.
You managed to bypass security protocols to access restricted data, revealing unsettling truths.
A sympathetic staff member helped you understand the extent of the experiments conducted.
You coordinated a covert exchange of information with other participants, forming a clandestine network.
An opportunity to escape arose, but you had to decide whether to go alone or include others.
You began experiencing side effects that suggested the experiments were affecting you unpredictably.
An encounter with a high-ranking official provided insights into the corporation's true intentions.
You developed a plan to sabotage certain experiments, aiming to protect yourself and others.
A close associate was removed from the program under mysterious circumstances, heightening your fears.
You successfully manipulated data to alter your test results, buying time to figure out your next move.
An unexpected friendship with a security guard provided you with valuable information.
You started to experience memories that didn't seem to be your own, causing confusion.
A critical experiment was scheduled, and you had to decide how to approach it safely.
You developed a device or method to counteract some of the experiments' effects.
Your enhanced abilities began to draw unwanted attention, increasing scrutiny from the staff.
You considered reaching out to external entities for help, weighing the risks involved.

late.description: You orchestrated a plan to escape the facility, coordinating with other participants.
An experimental mishap granted you unique abilities, but with unforeseen consequences.
You confronted a senior researcher about the ethical implications of the experiments.
A security breach allowed you temporary access to the outside world, altering your goals.
You discovered that the experiments were part of a larger corporate agenda with far-reaching impacts.
Faced with declining health due to the experiments, you sought a cure or reversal.
You were offered a role within the corporation in exchange for your continued participation.
An internal conflict among the staff provided an opportunity to influence outcomes.
You began to experience visions or insights that guided your decisions.
A decision to expose the corporation's activities put you in great danger.
You successfully deactivated a crucial system within the facility, causing significant disruptions.
An alliance with a rogue scientist offered a chance to end the experiments permanently.
You faced a moral dilemma when given the chance to retaliate against those who experimented on you.
Your actions inspired other participants to stand up against the corporation.
An unexpected twist revealed a personal connection to someone in charge of the program.
You began experiencing a decline in your enhanced abilities, prompting urgent action.
Facing the possibility of termination, you took drastic measures to ensure your survival.
